tool_description: Elevate Business Intelligence by using Alternative Data in your market and investment research analysis.
name: AltAPI
title: AltAPI

api_list.name: Text File Analysis
api_list.description: This POST request will allow the user to input a .TXT file which will then be analysed by the algorithm to provide KEYWORDS from the text file as well as SENTIMENT ANALYSIS on each sentence along with a compounded sentiment score for the entire text file.
